articles.author: CHRISTOPHER RUGABER
articles.title: Will the Federal Reserve cut interest rates fast enough to deliver a ‘soft landing’? - The Associated Press
articles.description: American consumers and home buyers, business people and political leaders have been waiting for months for what the Federal Reserve is poised to announce this week: That it’s cutting its key interest rate from a two-decade peak. It’s likely to be just the fir…
